attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: CREATE A REPAYMENT PLAN FOR ALL UK BANKS GIVEN DIRECT OR INDIRECT FINANCIAL SUPPORT BY THE GOVERNMENT DURING THE BANKING CRISIS SO THAT THE TAXPAYERS BILLIONS WHICH HAVE BEEN PUMPED INTO THE BANKING SECTOR ARE RECOVERED OVER A FIVE YEAR PERIOD AND THE GOVERNMENT/PUBLIC DEBT IS REDUCED ACCORDINGLY. THE BANKS GOT US INTO THIS  FINANCIAL MESS AND THEY MUST BE FORCED TO PAY TO GET US OUT OF IT.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
